wiki.content: As the intro to the album, HEAVEN OR HELL, Don Toliver is setting the scene for where this album takes place in his life. In verse 1, he illustrates his situation as one of questioning whether he will be choosing heaven or hell as a conversation in church. From here, he alludes to the idea of wanting to “get hotter” and “smoke some” suggesting that he may be leaning towards sinning, and thus choosing hell. However, in verse 2, by saying “Heaven or hell? It be a story to tell” he suggests it is more complicated than just a choice he makes. He paints the picture of his life as having to sell drugs to make money and avoiding the police, as a result of the cards he was dealt. By the outro, Toliver makes it clear that he is leaning towards a life of sin as he says that doing drugs and having sex are the “Type of shit [he] gotta focus on”. Read more on Last.fm.
